entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILC should run after ComputeResolvedFilesToPublishList #108909
  • License metadata on windows runtime nuget packages is wrong #108905
  • CodeGen infrastructure work (.NET 10) #108904
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Productize JitOptRepeat #108902
    10.0.0
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations (.NET 10) #108901
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Improve inlining in .NET 10 #108900
    10.0.0
  • Suggestion: Support Member Functions and Static Functions in C# Enumerations #108897
  • Process.StandardOutput.ReadAsync read data super slowly #108894
  • System.Text.Json serializes both parent and child properties when using inheritance, even when new or override is used in the child class. #108890
  • Json deserialization of polymorphic types does not expose the discriminator value #108885
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 35 Regressions on 10/11/2024 8:14:13 PM #108892
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 10/10/2024 4:40:22 AM #108891
  • Authentication is failing for domain user while connecting winrm with Negotiate auth type from the Ubuntu Linux #108878
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 10/9/2024 1:12:38 AM #108893
  • JIT: Clean up `fgGlobalMorph` checks in morph #108875
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DI container should respect generic constraints when resolving single instance. #108874
  • Intel architecture improvements for .NET 10 #108869
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/ComWrappers/API/ComWrappersTests/ComWrappersTests.cmd #108868
  • `IHostBuilder.UseConsoleLifetime` equivalent when using `IHostApplicationBuilder` #108865
    Future

Closed

  • OpenSSL 3.x deprecated RC2 ciphers #106248
    10.0.0
  • Use Vector512 in BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness #108887
  • Streaming response bodies from an HttpClient in UWP in debug builds will hang on large messages. #108622
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'link' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #108600
    10.0.0
  • InvalidProgramException error message is unhelpful. #101321
    Future
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #108215
    10.0.0
  • CodeGen infrastructure work planned for .NET 9 #93141
    10.0.0
  • build error: comparison of different enumeration types #108827
    10.0.0
  • ReadECDsaPrivateKey_BrainpoolP160r1_Pfx test failure on windows #108815
    10.0.0
  • Removal of hasDebuggingEnabled function in 8.0.10 #108863
  • [Uri] Provide lossless roundtripping for Uri between platforms (Windows / Linux) #33029
  • [swift interop] Cannot call instance methods with at least one parameter when using `SwiftSelf<T>` #107946
    10.0.0
  • [Uri] Can't parse file:/ on Mac #26424
  • [HTTP/2] Change headers type in HPack tables from byte[] to string #31861
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(ssize_t)emitCurStackLvl >= argSize' #106140
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #106948
    10.0.0
  • Missing System.Net.ServerSentEvents 9.0.0-rc.2.24473.5 on NuGet feeds #108860

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable using -sign in VMR scenarios #108908
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure a null PublicKey is supported on assembly refs #108907
    area-VM-coreclr, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use loop-aware RPO for initial block layout #108903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Stable branding for GA #108899
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Fix up some documented exceptions #108896
    area-System.Collections
  • [mono][mini] Remove support for the Xamarin.iOS and Xamarin.Mac assemblies in the AOT compiler. #108886
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Rename Net5CompatImpl to CompatImpl #108881
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • 2 accounting fixes #108880
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add security design docs for Dictionary, HashCode, and StringComparer #108864
    documentation, area-Meta

Merged

  • Remove logic around checking for and determining NGEN paths from dac-dbi interface #108853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move IsDebuggerPresent to minipal, convert to QCall #108837
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • unblock cloning of loops where the header is a try begin #108604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix CET debugger stepping over CALL instructions #108872
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Introduce a mechanism to disable CLR tests under SuperPMI collection #108873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Produce correctly typed IR in TLS helper expansion #108836
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Remove managed EH code frames from stack trace #108831
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make ExecutionManager.md markdownlint-clean #108866
    area-Meta
  • Fix compilation of Apple native shim on newer Clang #108888
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid `OverflowException` in `Boolean.TryFormat` #108572
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use default timeout of 30s. #108835
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108856
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix argument passing of structs with padding on x86 #108867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CET debugger stepping over CALL instructions #108809
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #108862
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.11
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #108861
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.36
  • Crossgen2 outer loop fixes #108819
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Simplify making IL base JIT Helpers #108349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Port NuGet Audit back to 9.0 #108854
    needs-area-label
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix folding of GC pointer arithmetic in lowering #108838
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108800
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2560938 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] testing #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] testing 4GB #108701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't call EnsureInstanceActive under StaticBoxInitLock #108736
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve error message for TypedHttpClient missing constructor parameter #108670
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Clean up in importervectorization.cpp #108818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed build error #108633
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
